column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: If initial reports are true
column4: French national Charlene Savarino has been deported to her native country of France.------Savarino was senetence to 25 years in prison in 2014 for her part in a heroin smuggling operation from Cambodia to Australia. She was aged 19 at the time of her conviction.------Australian ------Yoshe Ann Taylor------
column6: who was also convicted alongside Savarino was released in May 2019.------The pair were arrested on the evening of September 18
column8: at Phnom Penh International Airport after 2.2 kg of heroin were found in their luggage. On top of the jail sentences
column9: both were ordered to pay 50 million riels to the state.------SOURCE
